hero.title: Technology made
hero.subtitle: Master technology with confidence through personalized, step-by-step guidance that feels like having a patient friend by your side.

featuresSection.title: Features
featuresSection.subtitle: These are just a few of the features offered to help you grow!

items.title: Step-by-Step Guidance
items.description: Get clear, easy-to-follow instructions for any tech question. Each step is explained in simple terms with visual cues.

items.title: Voice Support
items.description: Ask questions with your voice and have answers read aloud. Perfect for hands-free help when you need it most.

items.title: Photo Explainer
items.description: Take a photo of any cable, button, or device and get an instant explanation of what it is and how to use it.

items.title: Senior-Friendly Design
items.description: Large text, intuitive interface, and patient explanations designed specifically with seniors in mind.

items.title: Safe & Secure
items.description: Your personal information is protected with enterprise-grade security. No data shared with third parties.

items.title: Instant Answers
items.description: Get immediate help 24/7. No waiting on hold or scheduling appointments. Just ask and get answers.

popularQuestionsSection.title: Popular Questions We Help With
popularQuestionsSection.subtitle: See what other seniors are asking about

testimonialsSection.title: What Our Community Says
testimonialsSection.subtitle: Join thousands of seniors who've found tech help made simple

testimonialContent.name: Margaret K.
testimonialContent.content: Finally, someone who explains technology in a way I can understand! The step-by-step instructions helped me set up my new phone perfectly. I feel so much more confident now!

testimonialContent.name: Robert H.
testimonialContent.content: The voice feature is amazing! I can just ask my questions out loud and get clear answers. It's like having a tech-savvy grandchild available 24/7.

testimonialContent.name: Dorothy S.
testimonialContent.content: I love the photo feature! I took a picture of a confusing cable and instantly knew what it was for. This app has made me much more confident with technology.

testimonialContent.name: Frank M.
testimonialContent.content: I was so frustrated with my smart TV until I found this helper. Now I can stream shows, adjust settings, and even video chat with my grandkids!
